val:
John was easily one of my favorite people to work with during his time at FreeWheel. He often went above and beyond for our clients; he's a shining example of FW's "White Glove Service" in action.

Not only was he knowledgeable on the technical side of things, but he was more than able to break down complex subject matter to make it easily digestible for both me and the clients. That's a rare trait with someone of his skill set.

Our clients trusted in John. His extensive knowledge and sophisticated touch was all he needed to develop the strong and lasting relationships he nurtured while pushing them to ever greater heights.
